name: Assessmnet for Graduate Emplyability (AGE)
description: be recognized as the GRE for employment,
overview:
About: AGE is a unique product by ANTZ AGE Technologies Private Limited that strives to be the next GRE for employment. We also offer our domain expertise on assessment and best practices in the industry to improve students’ employability.

Mission: To be recognized as the GRE for employment, establishing standards for employability.

Company Overview: ANTZ AGE Technologies Private Limited offers technological solutions to problems being faced by industries. Using skills assessment as a medium, the company strives to improve the face of employability through its flagship product, AGE.

Description: Employability is defined as the ability of an individual to procure and maintain employment in the industry. The employability of engineering and MBA graduates is on a decline and has resulted due to information asymmetry.

The stakeholders, viz. college, companies and students are realizing that the problem lies in the lack of “right information” available to them. We believe that an introspection is the key to solving this huge problem that faces the country. We facilitate this through our assessment, bench-marked against the industry standards.

General Information: We serve as a magical mirror that helps you get prepared for what lies beyond the doors of your college, in the corporate world. We tell the students and the college what the gaps are and the ways to fulfill them.

offices.address1: 31, Mezzanine Floor, Community Center, Basant Lok, Vasant Vihar, New Delhi
